CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 20, 1952, pg. 1 reads: "East Liberty Merchants Paint Windows For Xmas - Businessmen of the 5800 block on Penn Avenue sponsored a competition among the art students of five high schools as they sought to brighten their display windows for the Yule season. Here are the winners...Westinghouse High School [student]...Rose Marie Mammolite; whose painting of the Wolfarth Bakery window is shown at the right...-Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Exterior of Wolfarth Bakery storefront with painted Christmas display by Rose Marie Mammolite and Phyllis Pagnato, 5800 block of Penn Avenue
